TEXT.S: Carl Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1913 , ryax sa tay 16 nqu tay 11, Carl Anderson, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2001) qnxan nya Carl Anderson htagan beh sa Lynchburg,Virginia.hiya yaya yaba ga James ru Alberta Anderson. mqwas biru ga,Anderson sangka' mlaka' te babaw kayal skoki mhetay. 1965 kawas tmasoq pqwasan biru maki Lynchburg.
